name: Randy & Manilla Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U CPU @ 1.60GHz - 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 940MX
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11700F @ 2.50GHz 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce RTX 2060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an adventure with Randy & Manilla in this free demo. You will play with the first two Net-Cubes (Terra-Qubit and Gamezone Cube) to implement in their mission against the evil plans of Cracksom Virus.
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
